Create Default Conda Environment

Source: R/config_default_python.R
create_default_conda_env.Rd

Setup an conda environment with Napistu installed. This will install miniconda if needed (with user permission) and create an environment if-needed in an existing conda/miniconda installation or the on-the-fly installation. This process can be undone using cleanup_napistu.

Usage

create_default_conda_env(env_name = "napistu-config", verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

env_name

The name of the to-be-created conda environment

verbose

Logical scalar; if TRUE (default), prints informative messages about the current operation progress. If FALSE, runs silently.

Value

List with environment info and metadata
